name: jsdoc-tsd
description: JSDoc Template for generate typescript definition files from JSDoc comments

scripts.parse-example: move /Y src-out\core\publish.js src-out\core\publish.backup.js && copy /Y src-out\core\publish-example.js src-out\core\publish.js && jsdoc -r exampleProject -t src-out\core && move /Y src-out\core\publish.backup.js src-out\core\publish.js

author: Maximilian Wehrstedt
